local_intent: Perceive bread with fallback scan, move above it, tightly approach and align, then verify position at the bread.
assumptions: Bread is reachable and can be localized by raster scan if initially not visible
coherence_with_global: Matches global flow: visibility fallback -> DetectObject -> MoveAbove -> ApproachAndAlign (tolerance 0.005, 1200 ms) -> verify with IsAt.
